title: 123: Postpartum Support: Boobies, Bottles, & Doulas
itunes:title: 123: Postpartum Support: Boobies, Bottles, & Doulas
description:
The Broads are joined by Lauren Archer (postpartum doula and breastfeeding educator). They chat about the 4th trimester, what a postpartum doula is, what to put on your baby registry, questions about breastfeeding, bottle feeding, how being informed is best, and much more! 
ABOUT LAUREN ARCHER:
Follow on instagram: @loveofalittleone
www.loveofalittleone.com
A direct link to schedule a phone consult with Lauren:
http://loveofalittleone.com/online-support
RESOURCES MENTIONED IN THE PODCAST:
For mental health:
https://www.postpartum.net/
La Leche League 
https://www.llli.org/
The IBCLC Lauren works with: @lalactation
Evidence Based Info:
https://kellymom.com/
https://evidencebasedbirth.com/
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:
***BETABRAND: Get 20% off their first order when you go to Betabrand.com/chatty
*** ETTITUDE: Get 20% off your set of Ettitude sheets (and FREE shipping) by texting CHAT to 64-000
*** HELLO FRESH: Go to HelloFresh.com/broads10 and use code broads10 for 10 free meals including free shipping!
*** OPENFIT: Get a special extended 14-day free trial membership to OPENFIT when you text CHATTY to 505050
*** TALKSPACE: Use the code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month at talkspace.com
